IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE SCHOOL PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL SERVICES TO STUDENTS AT THE SECONDARY SCHOOL LEVEL
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO FOSTER THE INTELLECTUAL, MORAL, AESTHETIC, AND PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN IN PREPARATION FOR COLLEGE, A LIFETIME OF LEARNING, AND ACTIVE PARTICIPATION IN A CHANGING SOCIETY
IRS990.Desc: WILLIAMS MEMORIAL INSTITUE'S PRIMARY PROGRAM SERVICE EDUCATION IS EDUCATION FOR APPROXIMATELY 235 STUDENTS FROM GRADES SIX THROUGH TWELVE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, SALARIES AND OTHER OPERATING EXPENSES.
INCLUDED IN ALL ADMISSIONS ADVERTISING, PUBLISHING IN LOCAL NEWSPAPERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WILLIAMS USES SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICES (SSS) TO PROCESS FINANCIAL AID APPLICATIONS. SSS IS A SERVICE OF THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (NAIS) BASED ON THE FINANCIAL INFORMATION PROVIDED. SSS PROVIDES THE SCHOOL WITH AN ESTIMATED AMOUNT EACH FAMILY CAN CONTRIBUTE TO EDUCATIONAL EXPENSES. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES APPROVES THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF FINANCIAL AID TO BE AWARDED AND THE FINANCIAL AID COMMITTEE DISTRIBUTES THE AWARDS TO THE FAMILILES.
STATE OF CONNECTICUT HEALTH AND COMPLETE ISSUE NAME: STATE OF CONNECTICUT HEALTH AND EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY
THE 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW AND QUESTIONS PRIOR TO FINALIZATION AND FILING.

ANNUAL CERTIFICATES OF ACKNOWLEDGEMENT ARE REQUIRED FROM OFFICERS, TRUSTEES, AND KEY EMPLOYEES TO IDENTIFY POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST. IN ADDITION, THE BUSINESS OFFICE MONITORS THE USAGE OF VENDORS AND CONTRACTORS TO ENSURE INDEPENDENCE

COMPENSATION FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS DETERMINED BY A REVIEW OF PEER SCHOOL SALARIES. THIS INFORMATION IS OBTAINED FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS AS WELL AS CARNEY SANDOE, A LEADING SEARCH FIRM SPECIALIZING IN EDUCATION. IN ADDITION, THE 990 FORMS OF PEER SCHOOLS ARE REVIEWED. THE INFORMATION IS PRESENTED TO, AND APPROVED BY, THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

COMPENSATION FOR THE ASSISTANT HEAD OF SCHOOL FOR FINANCE AND OPERATIONS IS DETERMINED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL THROUGH BENCHMARKING STATISTICS PROVIDED BY THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (NAIS). IN ADDITION, PEER SCHOOL SALARIES ARE OBTAINED AND REVIEWED. THE INFORMATION IS PRESENTED TO, AND APPROVED BY, THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.
THE SCHOOL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST
